# Load data
```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}

wages_2018 <- read_csv("data/hourly_wages_2018.csv")
wages_2019 <- read_csv("data/hourly_wages_2019.csv")
wages_2020 <- read_csv("data/hourly_wages_2020.csv")
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
